author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-601 Add RecursionTooDeepException, thrown when recursion reaches a configurable
limit, and TooManyCallsException, thrown when number of calls readches a configurable
limit. And add implementation of limit configuration and checking

msg: CAMEL-1241: added genericfile<file> converters where we have file as well.

author: mcombellack
msg: Updated scope on the javax.servlet and org.apache.geronimo.specs dependencies as they are needed at compile time on JDK 1.5 and JDK 1.6 and not just at runtime
